channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 3 - Email Protocols Electronic Mail (email) Send Messages Across the Internet Developed in 1970s as Extension to FTP Originally Text Only Extended by Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Email Protocols Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) Post Office Protocol (POP3) Internet Message Access Protocol (IMAP) Exchange ActiveSync Email Server Components Mail Transfer Agent (MTA) Mail Delivery Agent (MDA) IMAP/POP/Webmail Server Image Source: Wikipedia cis527@cis527russfeldpuppet:~$ telnet mail.servergrove.com 110 Trying 69.195.222.232... Connected to mail.servergrove.com. Escape character is '^]'. +OK POP3 ready USER test@beattieunioncemetery.org +OK PASS uns3cur3 +OK logged in. STAT +OK 2 5580 RETR 1 +OK 4363 octets follow. Received: (qmail 11929 invoked from network); 26 Feb 2016 16:16:14 +0000 Received-SPF: none (no valid SPF record) Received: from mx-mia-1.servergrove.com (69.195.198.246) by sg111.servergrove.com with SMTP; 26 Feb 2016 16:15:43 +0000 ... ... ... DELE 2 +OK message 2 deleted QUIT +OK Bye-bye.
